definitions.definition: a quality of moving in a smooth, relaxed, and attractive way:
examples: Joanna has natural grace and elegance.

definitions.definition: to be in a place, on a thing etc. and make it look more attractive:
examples: Her face has graced the covers of magazines across the world.

definitions.definition: to honour people by taking part in something:
examples: We are delighted that the mayor will be gracing us with his presence at our annual dinner.
